author: bez625
content: Hi all, is there a working set of clients for devnet 5? I haven't managed to get a working CL / EL pair yet. I've been using client commit versions pinned in <#892088344438255616> and config from https://github.com/ethpandaops/mekong-devnets/tree/master/network-configs/devnet-0/metadata

author: parithosh
content: The network itself is having issues right now and is likely cause of some chaos when you're trying to sync. What are your logs indicating?

author: bez625
content: Well I just realised I'm trying to use the mekong network configs with the devnet versions of the code base <:facepalm:405166949065293825> . I'll get the devnet configs in and take another run at it. Thanks for replying <@199561711278227457>

author: bez625
content:

* lighthouse version: `v6.0.1-b6d80eb` (from `b6d80eb` in `github.com/eserilev/lighthouse`)

And it seems to get stuck with this from `geth`:

```json
{"msg":"Error whilst processing payload status","level":"WARN","ts":"2025-01-21T14:04:19.809918079Z","service":"exec","error":"Api { error: ServerMessage { code: -38005, message: \"Unsupported fork\" } }"}
{"msg":"Execution engine call failed","level":"WARN","ts":"2025-01-21T14:04:20.725811707Z","service":"exec","error":"ServerMessage { code: -38005, message: \"Unsupported fork\" }"}
```

author: bez625
content: <@199561711278227457> same issue with `single_attestation` - version built `Lighthouse v6.0.1-42c01c6`

author: parithosh
content:
ah im sorry i didnt realize you posted a link of the genesis files. mekon is pinned for devnet-4 images, the spec changed. So either you use the images you have and these config files: https://github.com/ethpandaops/pectra-devnets/tree/master/network-configs/devnet-5/metadata

or you use mekong genesis files and these images: https://github.com/ethpandaops/mekong-devnets/blob/master/ansible/inventories/devnet-0/group_vars/all/images.yaml

author: bez625
content: <@199561711278227457> I am using devnet-5 configs. **Previously** I was using mekong.
